name: Tidal Fury
description:
Embark on a thrilling nautical adventure in "Tidal Fury," a top-down boat shooter game, where players must navigate treacherous waters and face off against formidable foes! Developed by a passionate indie developer who has only dabbled in a handful of Unity tutorials, this game is a testament to the power of determination, creativity, and AI-assisted development.

"Tidal Fury" offers fast-paced, action-packed gameplay, where players must strategically choose and upgrade their arsenal of weapons to survive increasingly challenging waves of enemies and bosses. Battle your way through 30 intense levels, employing a diverse range of weapons including cannons, harpoons, sea mines, and even shark attacks! As you progress, harness the power of critical hits, multiple projectiles, and other unique upgrades to turn the tide of battle in your favor.

Created with the assistance of an AI language model, "Tidal Fury" exemplifies the fascinating intersection of cutting-edge technology and human creativity. Immerse yourself in this captivating, nautical-themed world and test your skills against the relentless forces of the sea.

Set sail for adventure and conquer the leaderboard in "Tidal Fury".

I used this project as an initial proof of concept for myself and my friends, inspired by vampire survivors and the like, to see how far I could get using AI to assist with games development. I'm quite happy with the results and have learnt a lot from this prototype, I will be looking to continue working on either this or new projects and continuing to explore AI in games.

In this run the game has 5 bosses spread across 50 levels, see how far you get! (There's a surprise if you manage to kill the final boss)
